title: HELP PLEASE -.-
body:
I dont know why its like this never had problem to update my client. Im stuck at 33% 
and i tried everything read others tut nothing.. 
I also tried to use hextech to repatch or i dont even know what i did i just know my update is stuck.

Help please :({{champion:141}}

replies.body: That client may be getting stuck while it's trying to scan the game files in preparation for the update. Let's first make sure League has the right admin permissions by following this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but let me know if that doesn't seem to help!
